name: Rocket Jump (popcron)
description:
Game modes

  • Free for All (ffa)
    • Shoot everyone and get the highest score
  • Payload (pl)
    • Blue team wins if they push the cart to the end, and the Reds win if they defend for long enough.
  • Blitz (blitz)
    • The only way to kill someone is by knocking them off the map
  • Wallhack (wh)
    • You can only see through walls
  • King of the Hill
    • The team with the most time on the control point, wins
  • x 3.33
    • Free for All but some gun stats are multiplied by 3.33 

Maps

  • Arena (arena)
  • Towers (towers)
  • Blitz (blitz)

Guns

  • Rocket Launcher
  • Grenade Launcher
  • Flak Launcher
  • Sticky Launcher
  • SMG
  • Rifle - Shots bounce of walls
  • Shotgun
  • Raygun - A constant laser beam
  • Blaster - A high damage, low fire rate gun
  • Flamer - A flamethrower

Local settings are stored in Config files, and so are guns and map layouts.

To mod a gun, take the existing gun from the Default folder, and place it in the Custom folder. Then press F5 in game to sync the mod with other players.
